!Kash: You are true to your word. Yes, this is it! I am sure of it... He he, only one more to go... Ah, don't pay any attention to me. I am just talking to myself. Yes, *the Mark of the Challenger*. I have entrusted it to *Martian*, a friend that lives in the *Giran Castle Town*. Go to him and ask him for it. I will write you an introduction, so show him my letter.
